lead_paragraph: It is unclear, however, whether the International Court of Justice will have jurisdiction in Iran’s complaint.

headline.print_headline: Iran Tells U.S. It Will Sue Over Assets
headline.main: Iran Threatens Lawsuit in Hague Court Over U.S. Ruling on $2 Billion

snippet: It is unclear, however, whether the International Court of Justice will have jurisdiction in Iran’s complaint.
abstract: Iran threatens to sue United States in International Court of Justice over Supreme Court ruling that it must pay nearly $2 billion to American victims of terror attacks abroad.
